titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: EMPLOYEE QUALIFICATION PLANNED COMPLETION DATE (SPECIALIST TRAINING) - Description

div.p: EMPLOYEE QUALIFICATION PLANNED COMPLETION DATE (SPECIALIST TRAINING) is the same as attribute EMPLOYEE QUALIFICATION PLANNED COMPLETION DATE where the QUALIFICATION TYPE is National Code 'Certificate of Completion of Training (CCT) - Specialist Training'.
Note: the Certificate of Completion of Specialist Training (CCST) was replaced by the Certificate of Completion of Training (CCT) on 30th December 2006.
